decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The proposed rooflights used must be Conservation type rooflights.  REASON: To ensure that the rooflights harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with policies 4.1, 4.8, 5.5 and 5.9 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan 'Plan for the Environment' (2004). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers, 0337/P/08 Rev A (received 04/10/2011), 0337/P/05 Rev B, 0337/P/06 Rev B and 0337/P/07 Rev B (received 29/10/2011), unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local Planning Authority.  Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Two dormer window extensions to rear roofslope, installation of one rooflight to north roofslope and two rooflights to east roofslope (involved with the conversion of roofspace to habitable use), and installation of two rooflights to side (north) roofslope of two storey rear outrigger extension
